com.CMPUT301W15T02.teamtoapp

Class ElasticSearchManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.CMPUT301W15T02.teamtoapp.ElasticSearchManager

  • public class ElasticSearchManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Responsible for online data search using ElasticSearch. In progress. All methods still need testing. Future claim-related methods: adding new claims to server (claimant), retrieving claims from server (claimant/approver), deleting claims from server (claimant), editing claims from server (claimant/approver). Adapted some functionality from AndroidElasticSearch by Joshua Campbell 2015-03-18
    See Also:
    https://github.com/joshua2ua/AndroidElasticSearch

      • getClaim

        public static Claim getClaim(java.lang.String claimID)
        getClaim() obtains a Claim from RESOURCE_URL if it exists. (Claimant/approver mode)
        Parameters:
        claimID - helps search for matching Claim object by claim ID.
        Returns:
        Claim object retrieved (if it exists). Source: https://github.com/joshua2ua/AndroidElasticSearch/blob/ master/src/ca/ualberta/ssrg/movies/es/ESMovieManager.java 2015-03-18

      • getSubmittedClaims

        public static void getSubmittedClaims()
        Get all submitted claims for the approver (Approver mode) If the search does not specify fields, it searches on all the fields.
